snippet: The amnesty fulfilled a campaign pledge by the new prime minister, Bidzina Ivanishvili, who promised to reduce prison crowding and to free people he considered political detainees.
abstract: Georgia releases 190 inmates identified by lawmakers as political prisoners; amnesty fulfills campaign pledge by new Prime Min Bidzina Ivanishvili, who promised to reduce prison crowding and to free people he considered political detainees.

byline.contributor: Andrew Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The amnesty fulfilled a campaign pledge by the new prime minister, Bidzina Ivanishvili, who promised to reduce prison crowding and to free people he considered political detainees.

headline.seo: Georgia Frees 190 Inmates Deemed Political Prisoners
headline.main: Georgia Frees 190 Inmates Deemed Political Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Georgia Frees 190 Inmates In Amnesty By Legislators
